attributes.action: Encourage Liverpool Football Club to apologise to the Italian people for the death of 39 Juve fans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Liverpool Football Club has never formally apologised for the behaviour of its fans following the Hysel Stadium Disaster. Liverpool Football club have a responsibility to make a formal apology and not rely on weakspirited gestures of Friendship

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
